name: Infiltration VR
description:
Infiltration is a Virtual-Reality based game where the player's objective is to infiltrate the enemy base, disable guard robots and retrieve confidential documents stolen by the evil Dr. Anti-Vector. The player is given a stun gun and has access to all security cameras on his wrist.

Infiltration VR is a Virtual-Reality based game created as a part of coursework.  The game has been created and tested on the Windows Mixed-Reality Headset. Haven't tested on any other headset. Looked cool, so thought I would share. Hope you like it!
